Foundations of Statistical Estimation (cont.)

Published

February 13, 2023

Learning Objectives

By the end of the week, learners will be able to:

  • Create and describe a sampling distribution of a sample statistic
    • Define in english and mathematically accuracy, bias and precision
    • Calculate and interpret a confidence interval

How to prepare

  • Clean up all prior course notes to date. Check content with classmates.
